item.name: all-outqueries
item.description: counts the number of outgoing UDP queries since starting

item.name: answers-slow
item.description: counts the number of queries answered after 1 second

item.name: answers0-1
item.description: counts the number of queries answered within 1 millisecond

item.name: answers1-10
item.description: counts the number of queries answered within 10 milliseconds

item.name: answers10-100
item.description: counts the number of queries answered within 100 milliseconds

item.name: answers100-1000
item.description: counts the number of queries answered within 1 second

item.name: cache-bytes
item.description: Size of the cache in bytes (since 3.3.1)

item.name: cache-entries
item.description: shows the number of entries in the cache

item.name: cache-hits
item.description: counts the number of cache hits since starting

item.name: cache-misses
item.description: counts the number of cache misses since starting

item.name: chain-resends
item.description: number of queries chained to existing outstanding query

item.name: client-parse-errors
item.description: counts number of client packets that could not be parsed

item.name: concurrent-queries
item.description: shows the number of MThreads currently running

item.name: dlg-only-drops
item.description: number of records dropped because of delegation only setting

item.name: dont-outqueries
item.description: number of outgoing queries dropped because of 'dont-query' setting (since 3.3)

item.name: ipv6-outqueries
item.description: number of outgoing queries over IPv6

item.name: ipv6-questions
item.description: counts all End-user initiated queries with the RD bit set, received over IPv6 UDP

item.name: max-mthread-stack
item.description: maximum amount of thread stack ever used

item.name: negcache-entries
item.description: shows the number of entries in the Negative answer cache

item.name: noerror-answers
item.description: counts the number of times it answered NOERROR since starting

item.name: nsset-invalidations
item.description: number of times an nsset was dropped because it no longer worked

item.name: nsspeeds-entries
item.description: shows the number of entries in the NS speeds map

item.name: nxdomain-answers
item.description: counts the number of times it answered NXDOMAIN since starting

item.name: outgoing-timeouts
item.description: counts the number of timeouts on outgoing UDP queries since starting

item.name: over-capacity-drops
item.description: Questions dropped because over maximum concurrent query limit (since 3.2)

item.name: packetcache-bytes
item.description: Size of the packet cache in bytes (since 3.3.1)

item.name: packetcache-entries
item.description: Size of packet cache (since 3.2)

item.name: packetcache-hits
item.description: Packet cache hits (since 3.2)

item.name: packetcache-misses
item.description: Packet cache misses (since 3.2)

item.name: policy-drops
item.description: Packets dropped because of (Lua) policy decision

item.name: qa-latency
item.description: shows the current latency average, in microseconds

item.name: questions
item.description: counts all End-user initiated queries with the RD bit set

item.name: resource-limits
item.description: counts number of queries that could not be performed because of resource limits

item.name: server-parse-errors
item.description: counts number of server replied packets that could not be parsed

item.name: servfail-answers
item.description: counts the number of times it answered SERVFAIL since starting

item.name: spoof-prevents
item.description: number of times PowerDNS considered itself spoofed, and dropped the data

item.name: sys-msec
item.description: number of CPU milliseconds spent in 'system' mode

item.name: tcp-client-overflow
item.description: number of times an IP address was denied TCP access because it already had too many connections

item.name: tcp-outqueries
item.description: counts the number of outgoing TCP queries since starting

item.name: tcp-questions
item.description: counts all incoming TCP queries (since starting)

item.name: throttle-entries
item.description: shows the number of entries in the throttle map

item.name: throttled-out
item.description: counts the number of throttled outgoing UDP queries since starting

item.name: unauthorized-tcp
item.description: number of TCP questions denied because of allow-from restrictions

item.name: unauthorized-udp
item.description: number of UDP questions denied because of allow-from restrictions

item.name: unexpected-packets
item.description: number of answers from remote servers that were unexpected (might point to spoofing)

item.name: uptime
item.description: number of seconds process has been running (since 3.1.5)

item.name: user-msec
item.description: number of CPU milliseconds spent in 'user' mode
